name: Escape the Puppet Master
description:
Escape the Puppet Master is a fast paced grid-based action strategy game designed to test and bewilder the player’s notions of what a game even is in the first place.  Much like real life, Escape the Puppet Master bombards the player with a perpetual onslaught of puppet goons controlled by the notorious Puppet Master.  Your goal is to escape the Puppet Master’s sadistic games by breaking free of his menacing Strings of Control and using them against his dastardly mob, but lo: Escape the Puppet Master persists long after the executable is terminated...  

  • Over 2 enemy colors!!
  • 4 whole directions of movement!!
  • Complex real time-turn-based mechanics 
  • Over 6 (unused) game sprites!!! 
  • The game’s highest merit is a soundtrack by Aether620

Jordan Schnur - Lead Programmer
